name: Mole Rescue
description:
Description:

Oh no, the moles are lost and they need to come back home!

Play for FREE this simple and addictive puzzle game where your mission is to rescue the lost moles by guiding them to their mole holes.

Mole Rescue features:

  • FREE
  • 70 Levels and more coming
  • Very easy to play
  • Funny & addictive
  • Moles everywhere!
Credits:

Design/develop: Carlos G. Prim (@fluiddot)
Concept design: Chusa Ramirez
QA: Txetxu Martinez

We hope that you will enjoy this game as much as we enjoyed create it :)
